name: Bottle Shooter Target Pro
description:
Bottle Shooter Target Pro is exactly what you needed in the modern era of shooting gun games. This real bottle shooter sniper games involve different realistic based environments like river, hotels, indoor and outdoor shooting sniper hunting.
How to Play
- Aim and smash the bottle
- Be accurate while shooting
- Accuracy will be tested in expert levels
- Move left & right to shoot more bottles
- Shoot to win
